content.prompt: What is indicated about the festival?

choices.label: It is the largest festival in Japan.
It has been held there for over 500 years.
Approximately 300 dancers perform in the town center.
The musicians are all from Shikoku.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity
